name: Asphalt 9: Legends
description: Asphalt 9: Legends delivers an adrenaline-pumping racing experience with real-world hypercars from top brands like Ferrari, Porsche, Lamborghini, and W Motors. Dive into breathtaking tracks, perform wild stunts, and race against players in real-time multiplayer. With console-quality graphics and touch or tilt controls, Asphalt 9 sets the standard for mobile racing games.

name: PUBG Mobile
description: PUBG Mobile is an intense battle royale game that drops you on an island to scavenge, survive, and eliminate opponents in a fight to be the last one standing. It offers realistic weapons, vehicles, and dynamic gameplay.
features: Multiple game modes including Battle Royale and TDM
Wide arsenal of weapons and vehicles

name: Strava
description: Strava is a GPS-based fitness app used by runners, cyclists, and outdoor enthusiasts to track performance, connect with a global community, and compete on virtual leaderboards. It is widely appreciated for its analytics and social features.
features: GPS tracking for runs and rides

name: Free Fire
description: Free Fire is a fast-paced survival shooter game where you drop onto an island, loot weapons, and battle to be the last survivor in thrilling 10-minute matches.

name: Roblox
description: Roblox is the ultimate virtual universe that lets you create, share, and experience games and virtual worlds created by millions of users. You can design your own game, roleplay with friends, or explore a massive library of community-made experiences across genres. The social and creative aspects make it ideal for endless fun.
features: Create and publish your own games

name: Samsung Health
description: Samsung Health is an all-in-one fitness tracking app that allows users to monitor their daily activity, heart rate, sleep, and more. It offers personalized health insights, goal setting, and integration with a wide range of wearables.

name: SoloLearn
description: SoloLearn is a mobile-first coding platform that helps users learn programming through interactive lessons, coding challenges, and a global community of learners. With a gamified experience, users can master programming languages like Python, JavaScript, and C++ while having fun.
features: Join a global community for support and collaboration
Complete coding challenges to practice skills
Track progress and earn badges as you learn
